name: logs_read
description:
Retrieves the details of a log.
A log is permanent immutable record of a node's history. A log is created when a user performs one of many actions. See the [actions](#Logs_logs_actions) section for more details.
#### Returns
Returns a JSON object with a `data` key containing the representation of the requested log, if the request was successful.

If the request is unsuccessful, an `errors` key containing information about the failure will be returned. Refer to the [list of error codes](#tag/Errors-and-Error-Codes) to understand why this request may have failed.

log_id.description: The unique identifier of the log you wish to retrieve.

$ul: **attributes**: The properties of the log.
**action**: The type of action performed on the OSF. See actions section for full list of possible actions.
**date**: The date and time at which the log was created, as an iso8601 formatted timestamp.
**params**: The type of action performed on the OSF. See description for full list of possible actions.
**addon**: The addon associated with the connected node.
**anonymous_link**: The view only link added to the node was anonymous.
**bucket**: The Amazon s3 bucket connected to the connected node.
**citation_name**: Name of citation associated with the connected node.
**contributors**: List of contributors on the connected node involved in the action represented by this node log.
**data_set**: The dataset associated with the connected node.
**destination**: A dictionary with information about the destination for the move of the item on the node associated with this log. Details include the path, url, addon, node_url and node_title.
**figshare_title**: Title of the fighshare project associated with this node log
**file**: Dictionary with information about the file involved with the log.
**filename**: Filename for the file associated with the log.
**folder**: Folder associated with the log.
**folder_name**: Name of the folder associated with the log.
**forward_url**: URL that the connected node forwards to.
**github_repo**: The github repository involved with the action represented by this node log.
**github_user**: The github user involved with the action represented by this node log.
**identifiers**: Dictionary containing the DOI and ARK ID for a preprint associated with the log.
**institution**: Dictionary containing the ID and Name of the institution associated with the log.
**kind**: Kind of the object associated with the log.
**license**: License for the associated node.
**old_page**: Old name of wiki page for a wiki rename log action.
**page**: Current name of wiki page for rename log action.
**page_id**: Primary key of the wiki page associated with the log.
**params_node**: Node that is refered to in the params of the log.
**params_project**: Project that is refered to in the params of the log.
**path**: Path for a file associated with the log.
**pointer**: A dictionary with information about the node that is linked to the associated node.
**preprint**: Preprint related to the associated node.
**preprint_provider**: Preprint provider for the associated node.
**previous_institution**: If a primary institution for the associated node is changed, this will show the previous institution.
**source**: A dictionary with information about the source of a move related event for a log. Details include the path, url, addon, node_url and node_title.
**study**: Dataverse study linked to the associated node.
**tag**: Tag associated with the associated node.
**tags**: Tags associated with the associated node.
**target**: A dictionary containing details about the target of the log. Details include the path, url, addon, node_url and node_title.
**template_node**: A dictionary containing information about the node that was used as a template for the associated node.
**title_new**: The new title for the associated node.
**title_original**: The original title for the associated node
**updated_fields**: A dictionary containing all of the fields updated on the associated node.
**urls**: Links to access information about the file associated with this log.
**version**: Version of the wiki page associated with this log.
**wiki**: A dictionary with information about the wiki page associated with the log.
**id**: The identifier of the log.
**links**: URLs to alternative representations of the log entity.
**self**: A link to the detail page for the log.
**relationships**: URLs to other entities or entity collections that have a relationship to the log.
**linked_node**: A relationship to the node linked to this log.
**node**: A relationship to the node associated with this log.
**original_node**: A relationship to the original node that was associated with this log, in case this log was copied from a node to a fork or registration.
**template_node**: A relationship to the node used as a template for this log.
**user**: A relationship to the user who performed the log action.
**type**: The type identifier of the log (`logs`)
